data.title: Who is Burt Reynolds' son, Quinton Anderson Reynolds? Everything you need to know
data.meta_description: Find out what Quinton Anderson Reynolds does for a living after being raised by famous parents. The article also explains why Burt Reynolds let him out of his will.
data.text:
Quinton Anderson Reynolds has been famous since childhood. Many know him as the only son of Hollywood actress Loni Anderson and her third husband, the late actor Burt Reynolds. Quinton also works in Hollywood, but not as an actor like his parents. His work is mainly behind the camera. Read more about Burt Reynolds' son below.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds?

What is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' age?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds' parents

Is Quinton Reynolds married?

Is Quinton Anderson Reynolds on Wikipedia?

How tall is Quinton Anderson Reynolds?

Facts about Quinton Anderson Reynolds

Quinton Anderson Reynolds, now in his thirties, opts for a private life away from Hollywood's glamor. Growing up in the shadows of his famous father, many speculated he would be his father's sole heir after Reynold's demise. They were taken aback when his will was publicized.

Profile summary

Full nameQuinton Anderson ReynoldsGenderMaleBirthdate31 August 1988 Age35 years (as of July 2024)Zodiac signVirgoBirthplaceCalifornia, USAResidenceCalifornia, USANationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteReligionChristianitySexualityStraightHeight5’10’’ (177 cm)Weight165 pounds (75 kg) Approx.Hair color Dark brownEye color BrownMarital statusSingleFatherBurt Reynolds MotherLoni AndersonSiblingsDeidra HoffmanAlma materCalifornia State UniversityQualificationDegree in Arts ProfessionCamera operator, editor, and digital image technicianPlace of workHollywood Net worth$1 million (Approx.)

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds?

Anderson is an American digital imaging technician, editor, camera assistant, and post-production assistant. He is widely recognized as the child of Loni Anderson and Burt Reynolds, who adopted him shortly after his birth.

What is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' age?

Burt Reynolds' son is 35 years old (as of July 2024). He was born on 31 August 1988, and his zodiac sign is Virgo.

Quinton Anderson Reynolds' parents

His biological father and mother are unknown to the public.

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' father?

His father, American actor/director Burt Reynolds, had over 180 acting credits at the time of his death. He passed away from a heart attack on Thursday, 6 September 2018 at 82.

Reynolds died at Jupiter Medical in Florida, the state where he had spent most of his life. He died shortly before shooting for Once Upon a Time began in Hollywood.

His niece, Nancy Lee Hess, released a statement saying he had health issues, but his death was unexpected. In 2013, Reynolds was admitted to ICU in a hospital in Florida for flu treatment. He had started using a cane in the years, blaming his limited mobility on the stunts he performed while shooting films.

Before that, Burt was a football player and a certified stuntman before becoming a movie star. His years of injuries forced him to start taking prescription pills. As a result, he battled pain pill addiction throughout his life and ended up in rehab in the late 1990s.

In March 2010, Reynolds underwent bypass surgery at a Florida hospital. He underwent back surgery again in May 2009, which caused his prescription pill dependency.

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' mother?

His mother, Loni Anderson, is a renowned actress from the USA. She has received numerous honors, including two Emmy and three Golden Globe nominations.

Loni and Burt were married for twelve years. He never had a child with his first wife, Judy Carne, and never remarried after divorcing the actress.

Following their divorce in 1993, Quinton primarily lived with his mother in California, while Burt remained in Florida. The geographical distance strained their relationship, but they reconciled in later years.

The divorce of this Hollywood golden couple dominated magazine covers in the early 1990s. Things took an ugly turn as Reynolds revealed details of their failed marriage.

He claimed that he had not touched Anderson for three years and had even caught her cheating on him. In his memoir, Reynolds explained how the actress was extravagant.

For instance, he mentioned that he gave her a platinum American Express card with a $45,000 credit limit, which she spent in half an hour. She would also buy 'everything in triplicate' and demanded to be dressed 'like a star.'

On the other hand, Anderson accused Reynolds of physical abuse while he was under the influence of substances. She also claimed he was not timely with his $15,000 child support payments.

Did Loni Anderson and Burt Reynolds have a child together?

Loni Anderson has a biological daughter named Deidre Hoffman, whom Quinto considers a sister. Sometimes, people assume both are Burt Reynolds' children when they are not.

Loni has been married four times and had Deidre with her first husband, Bruce Hasselberg. The actress never sired a child with her second husband, Ross Bickell, her third spouse, Burton Reynolds, or her current husband, Bob Flick.

Educational background

Quinton received his primary and high school education in California. He later enrolled at California State University and earned a degree in Arts.

What does Quinton Anderson Reynolds do for a living?

He is an experienced editor, camera operator, post-production assistant, and digital imaging technician. Anderson has worked on various television shows and films since 2011. So far, Burt Reynolds' son has 34 camera and electrical credits and 24 editorial credits.

What is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' net worth?

According to Mynewsgh, his net worth is allegedly $1 million. He earns income as a camera operator, editor, and digital imaging technician.

How wealthy are Quinton Anderson Reynolds' parents?

Celebritynetworth estimates Anderson's mother, Loni Anderson, is worth $12 million. Her wealth comes from her career as an actress and voice artist.

The same website states that his father, Burt Reynolds, had a net worth of around $5 million at his death in 2018. His wealth is from his acting, director, and voice artist career.

In his heyday, Burt would make $10 million per movie and owned a 153-acre ranch in South Florida. He began to lose money in 1993 after divorcing his second wife, Loni.

Three years after the divorce, Reynolds filed for bankruptcy, claiming $6.65 million in assets and debts totaling $11.2 million. Most of his wealth dwindled before his death because he trusted the wrong people with his money, and "women" cost him the most.

The actor told Vanity Fair in 2015:

I’ve lost more money than is possible because I just haven’t watched it. I’ve still done well in terms of owning property and things like that. But I haven’t been somebody who’s been smart about his money. There are a couple of actors who are quite brilliant with the way they’ve handled their money. But they’re not very good actors.

Burt Reynolds' Ranch was sold to the Palm Beach County School District in 1999 for $3.8 million. The actor also sold his longtime waterfront home in Jupiter to his real estate tycoon friend and neighbor, Charles Modica, 2015 for $3.3million.

Reynolds lived out his final years at his Florida estate. A friend purchased the property and rented it to him for a low price while the film legend struggled.

What happened to Quinton Reynolds?

Burt Reynolds left Quinton out of his will in October 2011 and gave everything to his niece, Nancy Lee Brown Hess. The document was made public after his demise in September 2018.

Reynolds appointed Nancy Lee as the personal representative of his estate. If anything happened to Nancy Lee, his nephew Brian Ritchey Brown and another niece, Tracy Erin Rogers, were listed as the next personal representatives.

Why did Burt Reynolds leave his son out of his will?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds was excluded from the late actor's will because Burt Reynolds had already established a trust for him. The will, which TMZ obtained, said of Quinton:

I intentionally omit him from this, my Last Will and Testament, as I have provided for him during my lifetime in my Declaration of Trust.

Quinton Anderson Reynolds' trust fund allowed Reynolds to provide for him while potentially reducing estate taxes. Hess may have been made the estate executor to avoid any conflict of interest, as Quinton was a beneficiary of the trust.

Was Burt Reynolds close to his son?

Burt and Quinton Anderson Reynolds shared a solid father-son relationship for 30 years. After Burt and Loni's divorce, Quinton and his mum moved miles away to start over.

Despite the complexities in Burt and Quinton's relationship, they shared mutual respect and affection and reconnected in later years. Burt often spoke fondly of Quinton, referring to him as his "greatest achievement," and was proud of his son's accomplishments.

Where is Quinton Reynolds today?

Burt Reynolds' son works in Hollywood as a camera assistant. He never asked for help with his career; he did it all himself.

Is Quinton Reynolds married?

Since there is no record of Quinton Anderson Reynolds' wife online or in public records, people believe he is either single or keeps his marriage private.

Is Quinton Anderson Reynolds on Wikipedia?

His biography is not on Wikipedia, but you can check out the life histories of his adopted parents on that website.

How tall is Quinton Anderson Reynolds?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds' height is 5 feet 10 inches or 177 cm.

Facts about Quinton Anderson Reynolds

Reynolds left Quinton out of his will.

Reynolds was Quinton's father for thirty years before he passed on.

Quinton and his dad were temporarily estranged during Loni and Reynolds' public and bitter divorce.

Quinton built his career alone rather than relying on his parents.

Burt was proud of Quinton and considered him his greatest achievement.

The late Burt Reynolds's decision to exclude his son Quinton Anderson Reynolds from direct inheritance in his will sparked curiosity and speculation. Many assume Loni Anderson and Burt's divorce was the cause until they discovered the actor provided for Quinton through a Trust.

Yen.com.gh shared Lizzie Vaynerchuk's biography. She is an American businesswoman and the sister of American entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk.

Lizzie grew up in an entrepreneurial family and is enthusiastic about real estate. So, she works as a real estate agent. Lizzie met her husband at university, and they have two children.

Source: YEN.com.gh
